programme.desc: The $5,000 Seven Card Stud World Championship attracted 144 entrants and created a prize pool of $676,800. programme.title: World Series of Poker
programme.desc: Phil Hellmuth headlines the $3,000 Pot-Limit Hold'em final table that includes Ram Vaswani and Phi Nguyen, while Gavin Griffin chases the title of youngest WSOP bracelet of all-time if he can emerge victorious. Who will win the $270,420 first-place prize and prestigious WSOP bracelet?

programme.title: World Series of Poker
programme.desc: The only straight Razz tournament of the 2004 WSOP would see a field of 195 players. Chris Bjorin, Hoyt Corkins, John Juanda, Howard Lederer, and Dutch Boyd all look to deny T.J. Cloutier his fifth WSOP bracelet as all eyes are on the $90,500 first-place prize.

programme.title: Poker Masters
programme.desc: The Event #5: $10,000 8-Game final table is set at the 2022 Poker Masters! Cary Katz is the chip leader ahead of Nick Guagenti, Alex Livingston, Steve Zolotow, Benjamin Diebold, Jacky Wang, and Brian Rast, as the final seven players play for the $186,000 first-place prize.

programme.title: Pokerography

programme.title: The Wait Game

Held captive in her own home, Yolanda is confronted with a shocking revelation that will forever alter the course of their lives.

programme.title: Carmen and Magic

programme.title: SistAhood 2: Calling All Lovers

programme.title: An Earl E. Christmas
programme.desc: Earl falls into deep debt after making some bad bets. He decides to fake a terminal illness to get the debt collectors off his tail, only to have his entire family show up at his home for one last special Christmas. But dysfunction and old grudges start to bubble over, making for a chaotic holiday weekend.

programme.title: The Laundry Room Stalker
programme.desc: A string of murders targeting local neighborhood sex workers centers around one apartment building's laundry room. Suspicion quickly falls on Calvin, the newly hired attendant who was just released after serving 12 years in prison. But this building holds a thousand secrets, and as tensions rise, the truth will unravel. Who is the real killer?

programme.title: Money Gang Lit
programme.desc: Hakeem Benson, a down-on-his-luck videographer, is evicted and adrift. He takes a risky music video gig for Bull Dawg, a notorious kingpin. But when a respected gang member is murdered, Hakeem is falsely accused and targeted. Now, in a city on fire, he's fighting for his life and meaning amidst the chaos.

programme.title: Toxic Friendz
programme.desc: Fed up with the status quo, a woman reluctantly attends her coworker's Halloween party, where secrets are revealed and things take a deadly turn.

programme.title: Troubled Mystic

programme.title: Perc 30

programme.title: Knee Deep

programme.title: What a Day Before Christmas
programme.desc: Nathan and Naomi are at odds about the direction of their marriage, and reluctance to get in the Christmas Spirit is shown by Nathan. As an ultimatum, it is insisted by Naomi that the holidays are spent by Nathan with her and her family, but it is Christmas Eve. The help of Nathan's cousin Keith is enlisted, and a road trip is embarked upon by the two as they race against time. An attempt is made to get home for the holidays and save the marriage.

programme.title: Mixed Christmas

When they arrive at their AirBnb, they discover it's been double booked by Aurora's ex-girlfriend and her new partner Axel. They have no choice but to combine their plans, and celebrate the holiday together.

Now, Tony faces a stark choice: witness or prison.

programme.desc: The Silicon Valley star uses his debut stand-up special to discuss tall women, disappointing his parents, and how he learned English from rap videos.

programme.title: Jimmy O. Yang: Guess How Much?
programme.desc: Yang dives into love languages, loser friends and negotiating with his Asian parents.

programme.title: Lavell Crawford: I Could Eat - Part 1
programme.desc: Lavell Crawford is back and here to contemplate how "My 600 Pound Life" could go for 15 seasons and he was still underweight, the kind of racist you have to be to not take a free holiday, and explosive consequences in a Taco Bell bathroom.

programme.title: Lavell Crawford I Could Eat Part 2
programme.desc: Meat's on the menu with Lavell Crawford keeping Burger King humble to their have it your way slogan, godless vegetarians, and why the best chicken is from a house of God.

programme.title: Bill Hicks: One Night Stand
programme.desc: It’s a wild night in 1989 of raucous fun as Bill Hicks shows us his unique view on smoking cigarettes, smoking pot, drinking, sex, advertising, and music.

programme.title: Bill Hicks: Reflections
programme.desc: Comedy Dynamics sits down with Bill Hicks’ brother, Steve, who tells old stories, squashes old rumors and reveals the brother and son behind the late comedian. Told amidst old and rare footage, it’s a must watch for any fan.

programme.title: Bill Hicks: Relentless
programme.desc: In this classic special from 1992, comedian Bill Hicks tells us how he feels about non-smokers, blow-jobs, religion, war, peace, drugs and music.

programme.title: Bill Hicks: Revelations
programme.desc: The comedian observes religion, evolution, childbirth and politics in London.

programme.title: Bill Hicks: Sane Man
programme.desc: Live comedy performed by Bill Hicks.

programme.desc: Leo Guzman falls off a ladder while painting a house. At first, his death seems to be an open-and-shut case but, as the autopsy unfolds, Dr. G believes there may be more to this case.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: A mother of infant twins notices that her son is not breathing. EMTs attempt to revive him, but it's too late. Now, Dr. G must work fast to determine if the other twin's life is in danger.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: 45-year-old Natalie, who's visiting her sister from Australia, is found dead the morning after a heated argument with her estranged brother-in-law. Dr. G suspects foul play and she must race against the clock to give the police and Natalie's family the answers they need.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: It's up to Dr. G to determine if alcohol was to blame in a man's death or if there was a silent killer lurking in his body.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: When an infant dies under mysterious circumstances, the young parents are prime suspects. Dr. G discovers several clues that bolster the child abuse theory, but the case is not clear cut.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: A mother and son are brought in after a horrific car accident.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: A jewelry shop owner is shot point blank in the chest during a robbery.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: Two gang members threaten to kill Dr. Carroll while he tries to save three men with gunshot wounds.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: A young boy is taken to the ER after being in a horrific accident.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: A boy is rushed in after breathing in an unspecified poisonous chemical. Has it permanently damaged his lungs?

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: Two patients are admitted into the ER, both experiencing seizures. An elderly man's lung collapses.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: A man is impaled through the skull with a crowbar, a woman has an internal worm infection and more.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: It's a busy day in the ER as Dr. Heilbron battles to treat a man whose intestine has come out, among others.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: An ER doctor gets his patient drunk to save his life as a guilty family member looks on.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: A young girl comes into the ER and can't move from the waist down.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: A paralyzed stroke patient watches in horror as his wife and his two girlfriends fight over him.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: An unresponsive golfer needs immediate surgery, three near-naked adults wreak havoc in the ER and more.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: Doctors must decide whether to put a hole in a teenager's head or wait for more help.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: A shooting victim is brought to the hospital. A Rottweiler gets loose in the ER.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: Another day, another surprise pregnancy. A woman in the ER discusses whether she's ready to be a mother.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: Dr. Michos has his hands full when ten critically ill teenagers are brought in after experimenting with drugs.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: A man crashes his car into a cow. A woman has a stiletto heel jammed into her cheek.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: A 21-year-old man has suffered internal injuries in a motorcycle accident.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: A car with teen girls crashes into a fence, with a pole shooting through the windshield and into the driver.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: A mother and son are brought in after a horrific car accident.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: A man is bitten by a deadly rattlesnake but because of religious reasons cannot receive a blood transfusion.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: Seven-year-old Brian has been hit by a truck and his arm has been ripped off.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: A dialysis patient is bleeding and doctors can't get it to stop. A naked man falls onto a cactus.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: A hospital worker feels like she's dying but doctors can find nothing wrong.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: A woman is attacked by a mountain lion. A difficult lady has abdominal problems.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: A young man has a 2-inch pipe through his head. A young bride is bleeding uncontrollably.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: An alligator snapping turtle is clamped to a man's neck and won't let go, a hurricane is impending and more.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: A woman gets stuck in a toilet bowl; a man's leg is mangled by a stump grinder; a nurse collapses.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: A teen's bulging tummy shocks nurses and doctors, a college co-ed mysteriously stops breathing and more.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: A young boy is attacked by a shark and comes close to death as surgeons battle to save his life.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: A deranged cowboy is drenched in sweat, saliva and urine. No one knows why.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER

programme.desc: A man is rushed to the ER with a 16-inch bar protruding from his neck.

programme.desc: Steve Harvey assumes the hosting duties for this daytime game show in which five members of one family are pitted against five members of another family. The winning family gets a chance to earn extra cash in a bonus round.

programme.title: 1 vs. 100
programme.desc: Professional dancer Carrie Ann Inaba hosts this show in which a contestant can win $50,000. The contestant, known as the One, competes with a mob of 100 other players by answering questions. When the One answers correctly, each member of the mob that answered incorrectly is eliminated. The One earns money for each mob member who is eliminated. If the One can eliminate the entire mob, he wins $50,000. But if the One gets a question wrong, he is eliminated and the remaining mob members split his winnings.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Monty Don shows how almost anything that holds soil and drains water can be used to grow seasonal veg, salad crops and herbs. Frances Tophill visits some hardy gardeners on the Isle of Man.

programme.title: Gardeners' World

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Monty and the Gardeners' World team look back at the horticultural highlights from the latest series and celebrate the very best inspirational gardens and gardeners up and down the country.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: It's the Easter weekend, which means extra time to get out and enjoy the garden. At Longmeadow, Monty plants out sweet peas for summer colour, gives advice on what to use for mulching borders and has plenty of ideas for jobs to get on with this long weekend. Carol Klein is at RHS Rosemoor to revel in the floral spring sensations that epitomise the season. In Scotland, JJ Chalmers explains how important his local park was in helping both his physical and mental rehabilitation.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Monty harvests his loofahs, plants tulip bulbs in pots, gives a masterclass in making leafmould and reflects on the gardening year.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Monty plants a mix of white flowers in the writing garden, demonstrates how to prune a climbing rose and reviews what's been happening in the vegetable garden. Adam Frost celebrates seasonal colour on a visit to a garden in Essex, and Sue Kent pots up allium bulbs in readiness for spring and replants a tricky border with lavender she's grown from cuttings.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: With the arrival of October, it is time to start thinking about getting some onions and garlic in the ground, and Monty Don shares his secrets on how to get a successful crop. Elsewhere, Carol Klein takes first-time gardeners Dan and Dominique for a day out in Devon. They are on the hunt for some seasonal inspiration for their new garden and what better place to look than RHS Rosemoor.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: We find out how Rachel de Thame got on over the past year as she attempted to grow her own cut flowers, and if you're still in a quandary about what to grow in your winter pots this year, Monty Don may well have the answer.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: As autumn gathers momentum, it's time to start putting the garden to bed for winter. Monty Don has some timely advice on what to do. Carol Klein meets a nurseryman in Herefordshire and together they indulge in the beauty of the Japanese maple.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: As the days get shorter, it is a busy time in the garden. Monty Don cracks on with his seasonal tasks at Longmeadow, giving hints and tips along the way. Carol Klein visits first-time gardeners Dan and Dominique for the very last time.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Monty Don is at Longmeadow sharing a wealth of tips and ideas on how to keep your garden looking good all year long. He tackles some urgent pruning, and reveals some of the projects he's got in store over the coming months.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Hellebores, the jewels of the early spring border, come under the spotlight on this show. Monty Don shares his top tips on how to get the best from them. Carol Klein visits a couple who have just moved into a bungalow with a badly neglected garden.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Monty Don explains why he thinks that the once-popular chrysanthemum is worth revisiting and Joe Swift has some helpful suggestions if you're thinking of giving your garden a bit of a spring revamp.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Monty Don plants up a new bed of asparagus and shows us how to lift and divide hostas. On our second visit to South Africa, we explore the conditions that allow agapanthus to thrive in the wild.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: At Longmeadow, Monty Don breaks ground for his new pond and Carol Klein pays Geoff and Sally Davis another visit in their Somerset garden. Their overgrown shrubs are in need of a jolly good haircut, but they haven't a clue where to begin.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: As the weather begins to warm up, there's plenty to be getting on with in the garden. Monty Don welcomes us to Longmeadow and cracks on with some timely tasks. Including Water Iris Garden, Peonies, Seaside Garden, National Gardening Week.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: With Halloween just round the corner, Monty Don is harvesting his pumpkins and showing how to store them for roasts, soups and stews in the coming months. Joe Swift visits a high end garden in West London to get some tips on how clever landscaping and the use of lighting can turn a small space into an outdoor room which can be used all year round.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: With Bonfire Night in mind, Monty Don turns his attention to the firecracker colours of spring when he begins to tidy up his herbaceous plants to make room to plant tulip bulbs. As well as recommending varieties for an early display, he also shows what to plant now under the shade of trees for colour next year.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Monty Don is at Longmeadow, preparing for the seasons to come. He demonstrates a quick and easy way to prune shrub roses and then plants up pots that will flower in time for Christmas. Grasses look their best at the end of summer and Carol Klein visits a garden in Somerset where they have been used to maximum effect on a sloping site with a range of soil conditions.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: We find out how Rachel de Thame got on over the past year as she attempted to grow her own cut flowers, and if you're still in a quandary about what to grow in your winter pots this year, Monty Don may well have the answer.

programme.title: Big Dreams, Small Spaces
programme.desc: Monty Don is asked to rescue two nightmare outside spaces. In Salisbury, newly engaged Glenn and Zoe want a brand new garden and most of all they are desperate to produce flowers for their wedding. Currently their steeply sloping garden is completely unusable.

programme.title: Big Dreams, Small Spaces
programme.desc: Monty Don is asked to rescue two nightmare outside spaces. In Salisbury, newly engaged Glenn and Zoe want a brand new garden and most of all they are desperate to produce flowers for their wedding. Currently their steeply sloping garden is completely unusable.

programme.title: Big Dreams, Small Spaces
programme.desc: In Brighton determined duo Helen and Dax have their hands full with twins, one of whom has special needs. Meanwhile in High Wycombe, newly single Valerie is looking for a fresh lease of life.

programme.title: Big Dreams, Small Spaces
programme.desc: Monty Don visits two sets of ambitious gardeners, each facing challenges on a very different scale. One is a tiny urban courtyard in Hackney and the other is a outdoor area for a community.

programme.title: The Secret History of the British Garden
programme.desc: Starting his journey at the sole surviving garden of the 1600s, Levens Hall in Cumbria, Monty sets out to investigate what the gardens of this age would have looked like and what influenced and inspired their creation.

programme.title: The Secret History of the British Garden
programme.desc: Monty bases himself at Rousham House in Oxfordshire, designed by one of the first practitioners of the landscape movement, William Kent. It has survived almost unchanged since its completion in 1741.

programme.title: The Secret History of the British Garden
programme.desc: Monty Don explores the extraordinary transformations that occurred throughout the 19th century. As a result of an expanding empire, scientific and technological innovation and social change, British gardens became more exotic, more colourful and more widely accessible than ever before.

programme.title: The Secret History of the British Garden
programme.desc: Monty Don concludes his journey through Britain's gardening heritage by looking at how the nation's gardens have evolved over the last hundred years. He looks at the profound effect that two world wars had on the attitude to gardens and gardening.

programme.title: Monty Don's Italian Gardens
programme.desc: Monty Don conducts a personal grand tour around Italy's magnificent gardens from the luxurious retreats of the moneyed north to the lavish hideaways of the romantic south. In this episode, he's in and around Rome, a powerbase of emperors and popes, to explore gardens that are among some of the most extravagant and flamboyant ever created in history.

programme.title: Monty Don's Italian Gardens
programme.desc: Monty Don is on a grand tour around Italy, this time visiting gardens both in Florence and around the sun-scorched Tuscan countryside. Monty discovers how, like a piece of sculpture, renaissance gardens were created as works of art, and how a group of Edwardian ex-pats mistakenly reinforced the idea that formal Italian gardens were flowerless.

programme.title: Monty Don's Italian Gardens
programme.desc: Monty Don continues his grand garden tour of Italy. This time he is in Naples to visit some of the most sublime, romantic retreats in southern Italy. After all the formality of the green gardens around Rome and Florence, Monty seeks out idyllic horticultural gems set against the dramatic scenery of the Amalfi Coast to discover why, in the south, gardens are informal and, above all, filled with flowers.

programme.title: Monty Don's Italian Gardens
programme.desc: Monty Don concludes his garden tour of Italy in the wealthy north where, in the Veneto and Lucca, extravagant pleasure gardens were created for flirtation and fun. In the Lakes, Monty meets up with the garden society, the Grandi Giardini Italiani, to peer over the fence at luxurious creations of the rich and famous. The journey ends on Lake Maggiore to see the most theatrical horticultural gem of Italy.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: The programme comes from all four of the Royal Horticultural Society gardens, where the team are out on the road exploring how each location's differing climate affects the plants they grow. Carol Klein broadcasts from Wisley in Surrey. In the garden at Harlow Carr in Yorkshire, Joe Swift gets plenty of propagating tips. Rachel de Thame explores the gardens at Hyde Hall in Essex, and Monty Don visits Rosemoor in Devon.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Monty gives advice on the plants that need winter protection and thinks ahead to colourful spring bouquets. The glory of summer may be over in most gardens, but Carol goes to Worcestershire in search of some autumn colour.

programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Monty welcomes spring at Longmeadow with plenty of changes in the garden to share. As well as getting on with some essential pruning, he lifts and divides perennials, starts sowing chillies and begins growing this year's vegetables.

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | 1,800 cars in remote area of California
programme.desc: Tom Cotter heads to the "middle of nowhere" in rural California where a unique collection of 1,800 classic cars is slowly returning to the earth. Next, we find Tom in the Carolinas where he discovers a 1954 Chevy Corvette and so much more.

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | RARE Hertz Shelby GT350, European Classics, and an all-original Datusn 240Z
programme.desc: Tom Cotter uncovers a rare Hertz Shelby GT350. Next, he explores an abandoned mine full of Porsches, Alfa Romeos and BMWs. Lastly, Tom talks with the owner of Datsun 240Z #00021 that sits in its original, unrestored condition.

programme.title: 50 Years of Turbo | The Porsche 911 Turbo Documentary
programme.desc: Jason Cammisa and cohosts review 50 years of Porsche 911 Turbo.

programme.title: The Driver's Seat with Henry Catchpole | AMG GT on Mercedes Secret Test Track, plus the new Porsche 911
programme.desc: Henry Catchpole heads to Mercedes' secret test track to drive and review the newest AMG GT. After that, Henry jumps in the new HYBRID Porsche 911 GTS (992.2) and wonders if the added weight will adversely affect the legendary nameplate.

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | Dodge Charger and a field full of project cars
programme.desc: Tom Cotter hunts for barn finds in Midland, TX, where he finds a 1972 Dodge Charger for sale. Tom then gets the stories behind a yard full of old project cars.

programme.title: The Driver's Seat with Henry Catchpole | A trio of incredible Mercedes sports cars
programme.desc: Henry drives Mercedes’ SLS AMG Black Series and AMG GT Black Series, two of the wildest, rarest, most expensive cars ever to emerge from Affalterbach.Next, another famous Merc takes center stage as Henry reviews the McLaren Mercedes SLR HDK.

programme.title: The Driver's Seat w/ Henry Catchpole | Unique Porsche 911s
programme.desc: Automotive journalist Henry Catchpole gets behind the wheel of pair of unique Porsche's. First, it's the legendary Heigo 911 rally car. Next, Henry drives the incredible Ruf SCR that "technically" isn't a Porsche at all.

programme.title: The Appraiser | 1969 COPO Camaro, 1969 Mustang Mach 1, and a 1969 Z/28 Camaro RS
programme.desc: Colin Comer starts this episode out with an original 1969 double COPO Camaro before moving onto a well-driven and well-loved 1969 Ford Mustang Mach 1. To wrap things up, Colin appraises a well-documented 1969 Chevy Camaro Z/28 "DZ-code."

programme.title: Chip Foose Draws a Car - Ford Bronco and Chevy C8 Corvette
programme.desc: A first-gen Ford Brono gets the full Chip Foose hot rod treatment.Next, can Chip redesign the new mid-engine C8 Corvette to have a stronger connection to Corvettes of the past?

programme.title: ICONS with Jason Cammisa: Lucid Air, Ford Mach-E and Mustang GT
programme.desc: In this episode of ICONS, host Jason Cammisa talkes about why the Lucid Air is a time machine. Next, he directly compares the Ford Mach-E and the Mustang GT... and how they both stack up against the Tesla Model Y.

programme.title: ICONS with Jason Cammisa: Toyota GR 86, and GR Corolla vs. GR Yaris
programme.desc: In this episode of ICONS, host Jason Cammisa reviews the Toyota GR 86 by comparing it to the Mk8 Volkswagen GTI and ND2 Mazda Miata. Next, Jason compares the the wild hot hatches from Toyota: the GR Corolla and the GR Yaris.

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | 367K-mile Barracuda, short-bed F100, & Ford Cortina GT Wagon
programme.desc: Tom Cotter hunts down a interesting Ford F100 short-bed pickup before coming across a Plymouth Barracuda with an incredible 367,000 miles on the odometer. Next, Tom finds the last Ford Cortina GT Wagon along with a handful of other rare cars.

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | $4M Barn Find - Rare Ferrari and 427 Shelby Cobra hidden for decades
programme.desc: Tom makes an incredible discovery! Behind the doors of a condemned garage lies two amazing cars, a 1966 Ferrari 275 GTB/2 and a 1967 Shelby Cobra 427. Follow along as Tom discovers, helps extract, and then attends the auction for these rare cars.

programme.title: Chip Foose Draws a Car - Z-Car, Countach, and XJ Jeep Cherokee
programme.desc: Chip Foose puts pen to paper and reimagines the designs of the Nissan Z, Lamborghini Countrach, and Jeep Cherokee (XJ).

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | Woodie Wagon craftsman and the story of Tom's Woodie
programme.desc: Tom Cotter meets an amazing craftsman who has spent many decades restoring and repairing woodie wagons and is one of the last people left in the world doing such work. After that, we get to hear the wild story behind Tom's Ford woodie wagon.

programme.title: The Driver's Seat w/ Henry Catchpole | Two rare JDM legends
programme.desc: Automotive journalist Henry Catchpole gets behind the wheel of two JDM legends: the Honda NSX-R and Nissan NISMO 400R

programme.title: 50 Years of Turbo | The Porsche 911 Turbo Documentary
programme.desc: Jason Cammisa and cohosts review 50 years of Porsche 911 Turbo.

programme.title: ICONS with Jason Cammisa - Lucid Air, Ford Mach-E, Toyota GR86 and Ford Bronco Raptor
programme.desc: 4-episode block of the award-winning "ICONS" series with Jason Cammisa featuring the Lucid Air, Ford Mach-E, Toyota GR86, and Ford Bronco Raptor.

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | The amazing and unusual cars of the Lane Motor Museum
programme.desc: Tom meets up with Jeff Lane to get a private tour of basement collection in the Lane Motor Museum. Next, Tom goes hunting for barn finds near his home in North Carolina.

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | 1 of 3 Santee SS, a "compact" Shelby GT500, dune buggies, and a Morris Minor Traveler
programme.desc: Tom Cotter finds a Santee SS with an aluminum block Buick V-8 engine, one of only 3 ever made. Next, Tom is introduced to a "compact" Shelby GT500 along with a plethora of other interesting barn finds.

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | Tom's Top 10 Barn Finds from the show
programme.desc: Tom Cotter breaks down his "Top 10" barn finds from the show so far, then goes to visit a friend and hears the story of a lost 1967 Austin Mini Cooper S.

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | Private tour of Collier Motors, an abandoned car dealership
programme.desc: Tom Cotter gets a private tour of Collier Motors, an AMC dealership that was abandoned 40 years ago. Next, Tom is in Maine where he finds an LS-swapped Rolls Royce, Plymouth Barracuda, and a unique Harley Davidson.

programme.title: The Driver's Seat with Henry Catchpole | Prodrive P25 Review and a Unique 2-Car Solution
programme.desc: Henry Catchpole reviews Prodrive's INSANE Subaru restomod, the P25.Next, Henry plays a little game of ""2-Car Solution,"" but with an interesting twist: two cars, same engine?

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | Low-mileage Buick Grand National and a restoration shop disaster
programme.desc: Tom Cotter starts off this episode finding a stash of cars that includes a 1984 Buick Grand National press car. After that, Tom visits the remains of an amazing Woodie restoration shop that burned completely to the ground.

programme.title: Dream Collection with Chris Jacobs | Canapa Motorsports and Surf City Garage
programme.desc: Chris Jacobs tours two amazing car collections. Chris' first stop is Bruce Canapa and his 70K-square foot Canapa Motorsports facility. Next, Chis visits the "Garage Mahal" of Kip Cyprus and his Surf City Garage.

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | De Tomaso Pantera locked in trailer for 35 years
programme.desc: Tom Cotter opens up an old trailer to reveal a 1972 De Tomaso Pantera that had been stored there for 35 years. A few years later, we follow up with the gentlemen who bought and fully restored to car.

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | 5000 motorcycles? Plus, a plethora of Porsches
programme.desc: Tom Cotter introduces us to Steve and his insane collection of motorcycles. After that, Tom stumbles upon and interesting stash of Porsches.

programme.title: Revelations with Jason Cammisa | Renault R5 Turbo and Saab 900 Turbo
programme.desc: Early turbo cars! In this episode of Revelations, host Jason Cammisa tells us the unique stories behind the Renault R5 Turbo, and the Saab 900 Turbo.

programme.title: The Driver's Seat with Henry Catchpole | McLaren P1 Spider and 750 S Reviews
programme.desc: In this episode of The Driver's Seat, automotive journalist Henry Catchpole reviews a one-off McLaren P1 Spider and the new McLaren 750 S.

programme.title: The Driver's Seat with Henry Catchpole | On the Track with Some Serious Race Cars
programme.desc: In this episode of The Driver's Seat, automotive journalist Henry Catchpole is on the race track with the legendary Ferrari 458 GTE and the new Maserati MC20 GT2

programme.title: Chip Foose Draws a Car - Modern Car Makeovers
programme.desc: Chip Foose gets to work on re-thinking the designs of a few recently updated models from Ford and BMW.

programme.title: Patrick Dempsey Returns to Racing in "Back on Track"
programme.desc: "Back on Track" takes you behind the scenes of actor Patrick Dempsey's return to racing. Joined by longtime friend and fellow Porsche driver Patrick Long, the two Patricks race in the North America Porsche Endurance Challenge.

programme.title: The Driver's Seat with Henry Catchpole | MST Mk1 Ford Escort and the Peugeot 205 GTI Tolman Edition
programme.desc: Henry Catchpole reviews the MST Mk1: Motorsport Tools' Ford Escort Mk1 restomod.Next, Henry jumps in another restomod, this time from Tolman Motorsport.

programme.title: The Driver's Seat with Henry Catchpole | NEW Aston Martin Vantage and DB12
programme.desc: Henry Catchpole drives and reviews the all-new Aston Martin Vantage with it's powerful V-8 engine.Next, Henry drives the all-new DB12, which represents the first of a new generation of the legendary DB nameplate.

programme.title: Ultimate Drag Race Replay | The World's Best-Sounding Drag Race
programme.desc: Lexus LFA vs Porsche Carrera GT vs Audi RS3The World's Heaviest Supercars square off in this episode of Ultimate Drag Race Replay - with the brand-new, 700-hp Ford F-150 Raptor R racing everything it can.

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | Dusty Porsche 356 Speedster and an all-original Shelby GT500
programme.desc: In this episode of Barn Find Hunter, Tom Cotter talks with a woman with a dusty 1957 Porsche 356 A Speedster that she and her husband have owned since the 1960s. After that, Tom heads to his hometown and shows a stash of rare barn finds.

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | $900 Richard Petty engine, Ford Galaxies and a rare Mach 1 Mustang
programme.desc: Tom Cotter meets "Snowball" Bishop, tours his personal junkyard, and gets some great stories about NASCAR and dirt track racing from the "good ol' days." Next, Tom gets the details on a rare Ford Mustang Mach 1 with a factory 429 Cobra Jet engine.

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | Prototype Mustang and a rare Mercury
programme.desc: Tom Cotter come across a prototype 1963 Ford Mustang that was specifically built for Henry Ford II. Next, Tom finds a gentleman with a driveway and garage packed full of oddball cars.

programme.title: Capturing Car Culture w/ Larry Chen | Mitsubishi EVO 5, and Secret Car Collections
programme.desc: Larry Chen travels to Indonesia and discovers a unique twin-charged, 600HP Mitsubishi EVO 5. After that, Larry heads to Singapore to check out its vibrant car culture and explore a secret collection of cars spread across several properties.

programme.title: Chip Foose Draws a Car - Classic Toyotas!
programme.desc: In this episode, watch as Chip Foose draws his creative take on the legendary Toyota FJ40 Land Cruiser.Next, Chip moves onto another Japanese classic from the same manufacturer, the iconic little sportscar: the Toyota MR2.

programme.title: 50 Years of Turbo | The Porsche 911 Turbo Documentary
programme.desc: Jason Cammisa and cohosts review 50 years of Porsche 911 Turbo.

programme.title: Capturing Car Culture w/ Larry Chen | Greatest Japanese Car Collection in the World, plus a perfect R33 GT-R
programme.desc: Larry Chen has the opportunity to walk through and photography one of the most amazing collections of Japanese cars ever assembled. After that, Larry checks out Mine's and Built by Legends incredible R33 Nissan GT-R.

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | 365-ft barn, Jaguar E-Types, and a Vintage SCCA Race Car
programme.desc: Tom meets up with an old friend in South Carolina who shows him a barn full of Jaguars and so much more. Next, Tom travels to New England where he finds a Sunbeam Alpine with SCCA race history and more.

programme.title: Chip Foose Draws a Car - BMW M3 and Fox-body Ford Mustang
programme.desc: Part 1: Chip Foose brainstorms modifications to an E30 BMW M3.Part 2: Chip takes his pen to the notchback Foxbody Mustang and explores what it may have looked like if Carroll Shelby had a hand in the design

programme.title: Ultimate Drag Race Replay | The World's Quickest Trucks and SUVs
programme.desc: Race 1: World's Quickest SUVs: Rivian R1S vs Aston DBX 707 vs Cayenne Turbo GTRace 2: Rivian R1T vs RAM TRX vs Aston DBC 707 vs Cayenne Turbo GTRace 3: Bronco Raptor vs G63 AMG vs Jeep Wrangler 392 vs Defender V8 vs Gallardo

programme.title: Ultimate Drag Race Replay - 2024 Mustang and 1990s Sedans
programme.desc: Race 1: 2024 Mustang Dark Horse vs Lotus Emira, M2, Supra, Camaro, ChallengerRace 2: The Fastest 5-Seaters of the 1990s - W124 500E v RS2 v M5 Touring + ND2

programme.title: Chip Foose Draws a Car - VW Beetle, Classic Mini, and a USPS Mail Truck
programme.desc: Designer and hot rodder Chip Foose uses his incredible drawing and design abilities to rethink and re-imagine the looks of the Volkswagen Beetle, classic Austin Mini Cooper, and... a USPS mail truck?

programme.title: Revelations with Jason Cammisa | A Ferrari and a Ferrari-developed Maserati
programme.desc: In this episode of Revelations, Jason Cammisa wonders if the new Ferrari Roma is a return to the idea of an "everyday Ferrari." After that, Jason tells the fascinating story behind the Ferrari-developed Maserati Quattroporte V

programme.title: The Driver's Seat with Henry Catchpole | Wild Ferrari Restomod and the Oft-forgotten TVR Tuscan
programme.desc: In this episode of The Driver's Seat, automotive journalist Henry Catchpole reviews the gorgeous RML SWB Ferrari 250 GT restomod before jumping into an amazing car that most people may not be familiar with: the TVR Tuscan.

programme.title: Chip Foose Draws a Car - AMC Pacer and "The Foosenberg"

programme.desc: Tom Cotter hunts for barn finds in Midland, TX, where he finds a 1972 Dodge Charger for sale. Tom then gets the stories behind a yard full of old project cars.

programme.title: The Driver's Seat with Henry Catchpole | A trio of incredible Mercedes sports cars
programme.desc: Henry drives Mercedes’ SLS AMG Black Series and AMG GT Black Series, two of the wildest, rarest, most expensive cars ever to emerge from Affalterbach.Next, another famous Merc takes center stage as Henry reviews the McLaren Mercedes SLR HDK.

programme.title: The Driver's Seat w/ Henry Catchpole | Unique Porsche 911s
programme.desc: Automotive journalist Henry Catchpole gets behind the wheel of pair of unique Porsche's. First, it's the legendary Heigo 911 rally car. Next, Henry drives the incredible Ruf SCR that "technically" isn't a Porsche at all.

programme.title: The Appraiser | 1969 COPO Camaro, 1969 Mustang Mach 1, and a 1969 Z/28 Camaro RS
programme.desc: Colin Comer starts this episode out with an original 1969 double COPO Camaro before moving onto a well-driven and well-loved 1969 Ford Mustang Mach 1. To wrap things up, Colin appraises a well-documented 1969 Chevy Camaro Z/28 "DZ-code."

programme.title: Chip Foose Draws a Car - Ford Bronco and Chevy C8 Corvette
programme.desc: A first-gen Ford Brono gets the full Chip Foose hot rod treatment.Next, can Chip redesign the new mid-engine C8 Corvette to have a stronger connection to Corvettes of the past?

programme.title: ICONS with Jason Cammisa: Lucid Air, Ford Mach-E and Mustang GT
programme.desc: In this episode of ICONS, host Jason Cammisa talkes about why the Lucid Air is a time machine. Next, he directly compares the Ford Mach-E and the Mustang GT... and how they both stack up against the Tesla Model Y.

programme.title: ICONS with Jason Cammisa: Toyota GR 86, and GR Corolla vs. GR Yaris
programme.desc: In this episode of ICONS, host Jason Cammisa reviews the Toyota GR 86 by comparing it to the Mk8 Volkswagen GTI and ND2 Mazda Miata. Next, Jason compares the the wild hot hatches from Toyota: the GR Corolla and the GR Yaris.

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | 367K-mile Barracuda, short-bed F100, & Ford Cortina GT Wagon
programme.desc: Tom Cotter hunts down a interesting Ford F100 short-bed pickup before coming across a Plymouth Barracuda with an incredible 367,000 miles on the odometer. Next, Tom finds the last Ford Cortina GT Wagon along with a handful of other rare cars.

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | $4M Barn Find - Rare Ferrari and 427 Shelby Cobra hidden for decades
programme.desc: Tom makes an incredible discovery! Behind the doors of a condemned garage lies two amazing cars, a 1966 Ferrari 275 GTB/2 and a 1967 Shelby Cobra 427. Follow along as Tom discovers, helps extract, and then attends the auction for these rare cars.

programme.title: Chip Foose Draws a Car - Z-Car, Countach, and XJ Jeep Cherokee
programme.desc: Chip Foose puts pen to paper and reimagines the designs of the Nissan Z, Lamborghini Countrach, and Jeep Cherokee (XJ).

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | Woodie Wagon craftsman and the story of Tom's Woodie
programme.desc: Tom Cotter meets an amazing craftsman who has spent many decades restoring and repairing woodie wagons and is one of the last people left in the world doing such work. After that, we get to hear the wild story behind Tom's Ford woodie wagon.

programme.title: The Driver's Seat w/ Henry Catchpole | Two rare JDM legends
programme.desc: Automotive journalist Henry Catchpole gets behind the wheel of two JDM legends: the Honda NSX-R and Nissan NISMO 400R

programme.title: 50 Years of Turbo | The Porsche 911 Turbo Documentary
programme.desc: Jason Cammisa and cohosts review 50 years of Porsche 911 Turbo.

programme.title: ICONS with Jason Cammisa - Lucid Air, Ford Mach-E, Toyota GR86 and Ford Bronco Raptor
programme.desc: 4-episode block of the award-winning "ICONS" series with Jason Cammisa featuring the Lucid Air, Ford Mach-E, Toyota GR86, and Ford Bronco Raptor.

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | The amazing and unusual cars of the Lane Motor Museum
programme.desc: Tom meets up with Jeff Lane to get a private tour of basement collection in the Lane Motor Museum. Next, Tom goes hunting for barn finds near his home in North Carolina.

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | 1 of 3 Santee SS, a "compact" Shelby GT500, dune buggies, and a Morris Minor Traveler
programme.desc: Tom Cotter finds a Santee SS with an aluminum block Buick V-8 engine, one of only 3 ever made. Next, Tom is introduced to a "compact" Shelby GT500 along with a plethora of other interesting barn finds.

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | Tom's Top 10 Barn Finds from the show
programme.desc: Tom Cotter breaks down his "Top 10" barn finds from the show so far, then goes to visit a friend and hears the story of a lost 1967 Austin Mini Cooper S.

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | Private tour of Collier Motors, an abandoned car dealership
programme.desc: Tom Cotter gets a private tour of Collier Motors, an AMC dealership that was abandoned 40 years ago. Next, Tom is in Maine where he finds an LS-swapped Rolls Royce, Plymouth Barracuda, and a unique Harley Davidson.

programme.title: The Driver's Seat with Henry Catchpole | Prodrive P25 Review and a Unique 2-Car Solution
programme.desc: Henry Catchpole reviews Prodrive's INSANE Subaru restomod, the P25.Next, Henry plays a little game of ""2-Car Solution,"" but with an interesting twist: two cars, same engine?

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | Low-mileage Buick Grand National and a restoration shop disaster
programme.desc: Tom Cotter starts off this episode finding a stash of cars that includes a 1984 Buick Grand National press car. After that, Tom visits the remains of an amazing Woodie restoration shop that burned completely to the ground.

programme.title: Dream Collection with Chris Jacobs | Canapa Motorsports and Surf City Garage
programme.desc: Chris Jacobs tours two amazing car collections. Chris' first stop is Bruce Canapa and his 70K-square foot Canapa Motorsports facility. Next, Chis visits the "Garage Mahal" of Kip Cyprus and his Surf City Garage.

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | De Tomaso Pantera locked in trailer for 35 years
programme.desc: Tom Cotter opens up an old trailer to reveal a 1972 De Tomaso Pantera that had been stored there for 35 years. A few years later, we follow up with the gentlemen who bought and fully restored to car.

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | 5000 motorcycles? Plus, a plethora of Porsches
programme.desc: Tom Cotter introduces us to Steve and his insane collection of motorcycles. After that, Tom stumbles upon and interesting stash of Porsches.

programme.title: Revelations with Jason Cammisa | Renault R5 Turbo and Saab 900 Turbo
programme.desc: Early turbo cars! In this episode of Revelations, host Jason Cammisa tells us the unique stories behind the Renault R5 Turbo, and the Saab 900 Turbo.

programme.title: The Driver's Seat with Henry Catchpole | McLaren P1 Spider and 750 S Reviews
programme.desc: In this episode of The Driver's Seat, automotive journalist Henry Catchpole reviews a one-off McLaren P1 Spider and the new McLaren 750 S.

programme.title: The Driver's Seat with Henry Catchpole | On the Track with Some Serious Race Cars
programme.desc: In this episode of The Driver's Seat, automotive journalist Henry Catchpole is on the race track with the legendary Ferrari 458 GTE and the new Maserati MC20 GT2

programme.title: Chip Foose Draws a Car - Modern Car Makeovers
programme.desc: Chip Foose gets to work on re-thinking the designs of a few recently updated models from Ford and BMW.

programme.title: Patrick Dempsey Returns to Racing in "Back on Track"
programme.desc: "Back on Track" takes you behind the scenes of actor Patrick Dempsey's return to racing. Joined by longtime friend and fellow Porsche driver Patrick Long, the two Patricks race in the North America Porsche Endurance Challenge.

programme.title: The Driver's Seat with Henry Catchpole | MST Mk1 Ford Escort and the Peugeot 205 GTI Tolman Edition
programme.desc: Henry Catchpole reviews the MST Mk1: Motorsport Tools' Ford Escort Mk1 restomod.Next, Henry jumps in another restomod, this time from Tolman Motorsport.

programme.title: The Driver's Seat with Henry Catchpole | NEW Aston Martin Vantage and DB12
programme.desc: Henry Catchpole drives and reviews the all-new Aston Martin Vantage with it's powerful V-8 engine.Next, Henry drives the all-new DB12, which represents the first of a new generation of the legendary DB nameplate.

programme.title: Ultimate Drag Race Replay | The World's Best-Sounding Drag Race
programme.desc: Lexus LFA vs Porsche Carrera GT vs Audi RS3The World's Heaviest Supercars square off in this episode of Ultimate Drag Race Replay - with the brand-new, 700-hp Ford F-150 Raptor R racing everything it can.

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | Dusty Porsche 356 Speedster and an all-original Shelby GT500
programme.desc: In this episode of Barn Find Hunter, Tom Cotter talks with a woman with a dusty 1957 Porsche 356 A Speedster that she and her husband have owned since the 1960s. After that, Tom heads to his hometown and shows a stash of rare barn finds.

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | $900 Richard Petty engine, Ford Galaxies and a rare Mach 1 Mustang
programme.desc: Tom Cotter meets "Snowball" Bishop, tours his personal junkyard, and gets some great stories about NASCAR and dirt track racing from the "good ol' days." Next, Tom gets the details on a rare Ford Mustang Mach 1 with a factory 429 Cobra Jet engine.

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | Prototype Mustang and a rare Mercury
programme.desc: Tom Cotter come across a prototype 1963 Ford Mustang that was specifically built for Henry Ford II. Next, Tom finds a gentleman with a driveway and garage packed full of oddball cars.

programme.title: Capturing Car Culture w/ Larry Chen | Mitsubishi EVO 5, and Secret Car Collections
programme.desc: Larry Chen travels to Indonesia and discovers a unique twin-charged, 600HP Mitsubishi EVO 5. After that, Larry heads to Singapore to check out its vibrant car culture and explore a secret collection of cars spread across several properties.

programme.title: Chip Foose Draws a Car - Classic Toyotas!
programme.desc: In this episode, watch as Chip Foose draws his creative take on the legendary Toyota FJ40 Land Cruiser.Next, Chip moves onto another Japanese classic from the same manufacturer, the iconic little sportscar: the Toyota MR2.

programme.title: 50 Years of Turbo | The Porsche 911 Turbo Documentary
programme.desc: Jason Cammisa and cohosts review 50 years of Porsche 911 Turbo.

programme.title: Capturing Car Culture w/ Larry Chen | Greatest Japanese Car Collection in the World, plus a perfect R33 GT-R
programme.desc: Larry Chen has the opportunity to walk through and photography one of the most amazing collections of Japanese cars ever assembled. After that, Larry checks out Mine's and Built by Legends incredible R33 Nissan GT-R.

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | 365-ft barn, Jaguar E-Types, and a Vintage SCCA Race Car
programme.desc: Tom meets up with an old friend in South Carolina who shows him a barn full of Jaguars and so much more. Next, Tom travels to New England where he finds a Sunbeam Alpine with SCCA race history and more.

programme.title: Chip Foose Draws a Car - BMW M3 and Fox-body Ford Mustang
programme.desc: Part 1: Chip Foose brainstorms modifications to an E30 BMW M3.Part 2: Chip takes his pen to the notchback Foxbody Mustang and explores what it may have looked like if Carroll Shelby had a hand in the design

programme.title: Ultimate Drag Race Replay | The World's Quickest Trucks and SUVs
programme.desc: Race 1: World's Quickest SUVs: Rivian R1S vs Aston DBX 707 vs Cayenne Turbo GTRace 2: Rivian R1T vs RAM TRX vs Aston DBC 707 vs Cayenne Turbo GTRace 3: Bronco Raptor vs G63 AMG vs Jeep Wrangler 392 vs Defender V8 vs Gallardo

programme.title: Ultimate Drag Race Replay - 2024 Mustang and 1990s Sedans
programme.desc: Race 1: 2024 Mustang Dark Horse vs Lotus Emira, M2, Supra, Camaro, ChallengerRace 2: The Fastest 5-Seaters of the 1990s - W124 500E v RS2 v M5 Touring + ND2

programme.title: Chip Foose Draws a Car - VW Beetle, Classic Mini, and a USPS Mail Truck
programme.desc: Designer and hot rodder Chip Foose uses his incredible drawing and design abilities to rethink and re-imagine the looks of the Volkswagen Beetle, classic Austin Mini Cooper, and... a USPS mail truck?

programme.title: Revelations with Jason Cammisa | A Ferrari and a Ferrari-developed Maserati
programme.desc: In this episode of Revelations, Jason Cammisa wonders if the new Ferrari Roma is a return to the idea of an "everyday Ferrari." After that, Jason tells the fascinating story behind the Ferrari-developed Maserati Quattroporte V

programme.title: The Driver's Seat with Henry Catchpole | Wild Ferrari Restomod and the Oft-forgotten TVR Tuscan
programme.desc: In this episode of The Driver's Seat, automotive journalist Henry Catchpole reviews the gorgeous RML SWB Ferrari 250 GT restomod before jumping into an amazing car that most people may not be familiar with: the TVR Tuscan.

programme.title: Chip Foose Draws a Car - AMC Pacer and "The Foosenberg"
programme.desc: Chip Foose reimagines the much maligned but legendary AMC Pacer as a custom delivery van.In part two of this program is a ""doozy!"" Chip explores the design of the legendary Deusenberg.

programme.title: One Make: Rising Stars in the Racing World | Presented by Mobil 1
programme.desc: One Make gives an unfiltered look at what it’s like to be an up-and-coming driver in the Toyota Gazoo Racing North America GR Cup Series. This episode features Mia Lovell, Westin Workman, Lucas Weisenberg, and Henry Drury.

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | Broncos, Galaxies and a lifted Grand Wagoneer
programme.desc: Tom Cotter finds all sorts of interesting vehicles on a trip to Northern Michigan, from Ford Broncos to a unique Ford Galaxie. Speaking of Galaxies, hang around for a look at a Galaxie 500 that is back on the road after being a "barn find" itself!

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | The real reason Corvettes exist, plus some wild JDM cars
programme.desc: Tom Cotter finds a "baby Corvette," also known as the Opel GT. Next, he comes across in interesting collection of Japanese sports cars.

programme.title: Capturing Car Culture with Larry Chen | Daigo Saito and TJ Hunt
programme.desc: Larry Chen visits of of the greatest drift car garages in the world owned my driver Daigo Saito. After that, Larry visits TJ Hunt and gets the details on his GT-R-powered Ford Mustang.

programme.title: On Deck
programme.desc: For someone like Capt. Cory who's out on the water most days of the year, it's easy to notice the little changes that show the stress on an ecosystem. Whether that's subtle movements of fish from lingering red tide blooms or large-scale impacts from high-volume Lak Okeechobee discharges, he sees it all, and he's ready for things to change. "I wish we would get to a point where we really put our foot down and do something about it before it's too late."Watch this episode to learn more about what's going on and to see why Capt. Cory is so passionate about fighting to protect the places he loves. Visit https://captainsforcleanwater.org to join the fight.

programme.desc: An obsessively organized man learns that he’s sterile … and that his daughter was fathered by his best friend.

programme.title: Ladyhawke
programme.desc: A medieval pickpocket who escapes the noose becomes indebted to a shapeshifting knight and his star-crossed lover on a revenge quest to kill a bishop.

programme.title: Message in a Bottle
programme.desc: A lonely woman's discovery of a man's letter in a bottle leads to love.

programme.title: Ready to Rumble
programme.desc: Two sanitation workers and diehard wrestling fans watch their idol suffer a career-ending defeat and travel to Atlanta to mastermind his comeback.

programme.title: Dark City
programme.desc: A man wanted for murder realizes that everything he believes about himself is a lie and is the creation of a group known as "The Strangers."

programme.title: Deep Cover
programme.desc: A maverick Cleveland cop with a turbulent past gets hand-picked by the DEA to infiltrate an international cocaine cartel in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Grilled
programme.desc: Two meat salesmen must move an entire herd of beef by the end of the day.

programme.title: Nothing but Trouble
programme.desc: A couple's trip takes a detour to a mansion filled with contraptions.

programme.title: Fandango
programme.desc: Five young men about to graduate from college, take one last trip before facing their lives as adults.

programme.title: Stroker Ace
programme.desc: A winning NASCAR driver is forced to accept an onerous contract from a fried chicken magnate.

programme.title: Corrina, Corrina
programme.desc: A family devastated by grief meets a woman who helps heal the loss.

programme.title: The Rite
programme.desc: A priest introduces a seminary student to the darker side of his faith.

programme.title: Critters
programme.desc: Outer-space furballs devour everything in their path in a small town.

programme.title: Critters 2: The Main Course
programme.desc: The nasty little aliens with voracious appetites for human flesh are back!

programme.title: Critters III
programme.desc: Little aliens make their way to a city in search of their favorite snack.

programme.title: Cops and Robbersons
programme.desc: When a no-nonsense cop moves in with the meddlesome Robberson family to stake out the mobsters next door, his assignment becomes anything but routine.

programme.title: Final Descent
programme.desc: When his aircraft collides with another plane in midair, Captain Glen "Lucky" Singer must try to save the lives of his 319 passengers.

programme.title: Hero Wanted
programme.desc: A small-town trash collector stages a robbery to impress a woman by playing the hero, but his perfect plan takes a real-life, murderous turn.

programme.title: Sahara
programme.desc: An American tank crew in WWII must contend with thirsty Nazi troops while crossing the Sahara in search of a fabled water well.

programme.title: Faith of My Fathers
programme.desc: This adaptation of John McCain's best-selling autobiography chronicles his experiences as a Navy pilot and five years as a POW in North Vietnam.

programme.title: Vertical Limit
programme.desc: Feeling responsible for his father's death, which occurred during a climbing expedition, Peter Garrett (Chris O'Donnell) has quit the pursuit in favor of photography, while his sister, Annie (Robin Tunney), has become a top climber. After Annie is hired by wealthy businessman Elliot Vaughn (Bill Paxton) to lead a trek, inclement weather causes the crew to become trapped. Facing his fears, Peter assembles a rescue team, including experienced climber Montgomery Wick (Scott Glenn), to save them.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: The story of a man looking to redeem himself by saving the life of America's highest elected official, even if it means sacrificing himself.

programme.title: The Take
programme.desc: When Felix finds himself in the middle of a carefully orchestrated heist, he takes it upon himself to find the real perpetrators and clear his name.

programme.title: The Deal
programme.desc: After losing her husband and daughter in a terrible fire, an American woman living in Spain investigates a dangerous mystery surrounding their deaths.

programme.title: Bad Country
programme.desc: Set in 1983, this is the tale of a Baton Rouge detective who uses an informant to infiltrate the most sinister criminal enterprise in the South.

programme.title: Cowboy Up
programme.desc: Follow the tumultuous life of two brothers, Ely, a rising rodeo star, and Hank, a rodeo clown, as they make their way through the bull riding circuit.

programme.title: Maximum Risk
programme.desc: A police officer and his twin brother's fiancée team up to expose an international conspiracy in this erotic, globe-hopping adventure.

programme.title: Gloria
programme.desc: Released from prison, Gloria finds herself the reluctant guardian of a young boy who has become the target of a ruthless multinational conglomerate.

programme.title: Toy Soldiers
programme.desc: The teen action classic about a group of troublesome students from an exclusive prep school who defend it when Colombian terrorists lay siege to it.

programme.title: The Principal
programme.desc: After taking a bat to the Porsche of his ex-wife’s divorce attorney, teacher Rick Latimer is punished with a principal post at a violent high school.

programme.title: Life Without Dick
programme.desc: After shooting her boyfriend, she meets the hitman who had been planning to kill him. As the two dispose of his body, romantic sparks begin to fly.

programme.title: The Undercover Man
programme.desc: Determined Treasury Department investigator Frank Warren (Glenn Ford) goes after a ruthless mobster known as The Big Fellow. When a key informant is murdered, Warren pursues the gangster on charges of tax evasion. But, with a slick mob lawyer hampering him at every turn, and threats being lobbed toward Warren's wife (Nina Foch), the lawman's chances of achieving a conviction are slim to none. His only hope is that one syndicate bookkeeper will have the courage to turn state's evidence.

programme.title: Where Angels Go...Trouble Follows
programme.desc: A bus trip for the girls of St. Francis Academy in Pennsylvania takes a radical detour on its way to an interfaith youth rally in California.

programme.title: Our Man in Havana
programme.desc: A vacuum cleaner salesman is recruited as a spy by the British secret service. Despite his phony reports and lies, he quickly gains importance.

programme.title: Murderer's Row
programme.desc: Secret agent Matt Helm must rescue the kidnapped inventor of an ultra-destructive "helio beam" capable of destroying Washington, D.C.

programme.title: The Mating of Millie
programme.desc: A businesswoman (Evelyn Keyes) asks a bachelor (Glenn Ford) to help her find a husband so she can adopt an orphan.

programme.title: Walk, Don't Run
programme.desc: During the Olympics, an electronics expert learns his hotel room will not be available for two days, and is forced to share an apartment with a woman.

programme.title: You Belong to Me
programme.desc: Rich playboy Peter Kirk (Henry Fonda) crashes into Dr. Helen Hunt (Barbara Stanwyck) on a ski slope and overplays his injuries so she will continue her medical attention. He declares his love, and, although Helen insists that her career will always come first, the two get married. Soon, Peter is consumed by jealous suspicions of his wife's male patients and embarrasses Helen several times. Fearful of driving her away, Peter launches into character-changing behavior to prove his love.

programme.title: Salome
programme.desc: Salome tries to save John the Baptist from losing his head to the sword of King Herod, reversing the story that she was responsible for his death.

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: This steamy pot-boiler follows the intrigues surrounding an escaped convict who attempts to return to the small southern town where he grew up.

programme.title: Love Has Many Faces
programme.desc: Wealthy Kit Jordan (Lana Turner) and her dissolute husband, Pete (Cliff Robertson), are in Acapulco, Mexico, when a corpse washes onto the beach. The deceased was a lover of Kit's and a friend of Pete's, so the police question the Jordans. Then the dead man's girlfriend (Stefanie Powers) arrives, and she and Pete have an affair. Luckily, Kit has her choice of men to distract her. There is gigolo Hank (Hugh O'Brian), bullfighter Julian (Carlos Montalban) and, when in a pinch, even her husband.

programme.title: 711 Ocean Drive
programme.desc: A phone company repairman bites off more than he can chew when he agrees to create a system that broadcasts race track results for a crime boss.

programme.title: The Devil at 4 O'Clock
programme.desc: After a volcano erupts on a South Sea island, a fallen priest and three convicts race to save the lives of children in a mountaintop leper colony.

programme.title: All the King's Men
programme.desc: This Academy Award winner for Best Picture tells the story of an idealistic Southern politician brought down by his own ambition and lust for power.

programme.title: First Men in the Moon
programme.desc: Convinced they’re the first men on the moon, three astronauts discover evidence of a lunar landing decades earlier and track down its sole survivor.

programme.title: The Bedford Incident
programme.desc: Reporter Ben Munceford (Sidney Poitier) is aboard a U.S. Navy ship sailing near the Arctic Circle, on assignment to write a profile of Capt. Eric Finlander (Richard Widmark), a hardened anti-communist. Despite the concerns of Munceford, medical officer Chester Potter (Martin Balsam) and others on the ship, Finlander is shadowing a Soviet submarine on patrol in the same area, hoping to make it to surface. The cat-and-mouse game, however, turns deadly serious.

programme.title: You Can't Run Away From It
programme.desc: A spoiled heiress teams up with an enterprising reporter to escape her domineering father's plan of keeping her from getting married.

programme.title: The Man From Colorado
programme.desc: In Colorado at the end of the Civil War, Col. Owen Devereaux (Glenn Ford), affected by four years of brutal bloodshed, orders the massacre of a Confederate unit, even as they try to surrender. Devereaux's friend and second in command, Capt. Del Stewart (William Holden), is the only one aware of the surrender attempt. Devereaux returns home to a hero's welcome and is appointed a judge, yet his irrational and angry behavior continues, affecting his fianceé, Caroline (Ellen Drew), as well as Del.

programme.title: Battle of Rogue River
programme.desc: A cavalry major (George Montgomery) makes peace with Indians despite an agitator (Richard Denning) working for carpetbaggers.

programme.title: The Hawk of Wild River
programme.desc: The Durango Kid (Charles Starrett) has himself thrown in jail to trick an outlaw known as the Hawk (Clayton Moore) and bring him and his entire gang to justice.

programme.title: The Hard Man
programme.desc: A Texas Ranger (Guy Madison) turns deputy sheriff; a woman (Valerie French) wants him to kill her cattle-baron husband (Lorne Greene).

programme.title: Smoky Canyon
programme.desc: The masked Durango Kid (Charles Starrett) settles a feud between cattlemen and sheepmen.

programme.title: The Last Posse
programme.desc: To settle an old score, a father and his sons rob a cattle-swindling rancher, go into hiding, and soon find a posse of townsfolk after them.

programme.title: Last of the Comanches
programme.desc: A cavalry sergeant (Broderick Crawford) leads soldiers, civilians and an Indian (Johnny Stewart) on a desert trek.

programme.title: Hangman's Knot
programme.desc: Major Matt Stewart (Randolph Scott) leads a troop of Confederate soldiers on a raid, targeting a wagon that is transporting Union gold. All of the Union soldiers are killed except for one, who informs Stewart that the war had already ended a month ago. Stewart leads the troop into hiding, knowing they could face murder charges. After capturing a coach driven by nurse Molly Hull (Donna Reed), the soldiers try to evade a group of bandits chasing them to steal the gold.

programme.title: The Nevadan
programme.desc: After fleeing a sheriff's escort to jail, an outlaw thief crosses paths with a mysterious stranger and a greedy rancher en route to his stash of gold.

programme.title: The Professionals
programme.desc: Four soldiers of fortune are hired by a wealthy rancher to rescue his beautiful young wife who has been kidnapped by a villainous Mexican bandit. When they finally find her, after fighting their way across deserts and mountains, they discover she is not being held against her will. This causes friction within the band as to whether they should honor their agreement.

programme.title: The Return of Wild Bill
programme.desc: Wild Bill Saunders comes home to help his father deal with troublesome ranchers.

programme.title: Phantom Stagecoach
programme.desc: A dispute between stage lines ends with a steel-armored stagecoach.

programme.title: Streets of Ghost Town
programme.desc: The Durango Kid (Charles Starrett) and his sidekick (Smiley Burnette) look for stolen gold with a history.

programme.title: Gunfighters
programme.desc: Brazos Kane, a gunslinger who's vowed to kill no more, goes to work for a land baron on a ranch, where he is unjustly accused of murder.

programme.title: The Rough, Tough West
programme.desc: The Durango Kid (Charles Starrett) looks for his friend Big Jack (Jack Mahoney) and finds out that Jack is illegally commandeering the mines and claims of others.

programme.title: The Black Dakotas
programme.desc: A Confederate plot to turn the Sioux against the Union crumbles when a double agent makes off with a shipment of gold.

programme.title: Al Jennings of Oklahoma
programme.desc: Lawyer Al (Dan Duryea) and brother Frank (Dick Foran) turn to robbing banks and trains after Union troops raid their home.

programme.title: Jubal
programme.desc: Searching for work, cowboy Jubal Troop (Glenn Ford) arrives in a small town, where he badly injures his hand. Fortunately, a local rancher, Shep Horgan (Ernest Borgnine), is willing to employ Troop despite the injury. Horgan and Troop work together amicably, but Horgan's two-timing wife (Valerie French) threatens to create discord when she becomes interested in Troop, although he really loves another woman. A jealous cowhand (Rod Steiger) complicates matters by spreading lies.

programme.title: Masterson of Kansas
programme.desc: In the 1870s, Marshal Wyatt Earp (Bruce Cowling) calls upon Dodge City, Kan., Sheriff Bat Masterson (George Montgomery) to track down rancher Merrick (John Maxwell), who is accused of murder. But, thanks to some proof held by local Native American Chief Yellow Hawk (Jay Silverheels), Masterson realizes Merrick might be the victim of a frame-up. So, with the help of Earp and gunfighter Doc Holliday (James Griffith), Masterson sets out to find those who are really behind the killing.

programme.title: Comanche Station
programme.desc: When solitary cowboy Jefferson Cody (Randolph Scott) hears tales of a white woman living as a captive of the Comanche tribe, he rides deep into the tribe's territory to exchange goods for her freedom. As Cody escorts the captive woman away, he learns that she is Nancy Lowe (Nancy Gates), and that there is a sizable reward offered by her husband for her return. Cody and Mrs. Lowe must brave ruthless bounty hunters greedy for the reward, as well as the now-warring Comanches, to make it to safety.

programme.title: The Guns of Fort Petticoat
programme.desc: Texan and U.S. Cavalryman Lt. Frank Hewitt (Audie Murphy) deserts the army after Colorado Union soldiers carry out the deadly Sand Creek reservation massacre, fearing reprisal from the Cheyenne. Crossing into Texas, Franks finds himself labeled a traitor for fighting with the Yankees, and his warnings about possible Indian revenge go unheeded. When a town near a mission, populated mostly by women, is attacked, Frank is appointed their protector and must build an army comprised of townswomen.

programme.title: Battle of the Bulge
programme.desc: A crack Nazi unit holds off the Allies during World War II.

programme.title: The Charge of the Light Brigade

programme.title: Midsomer Murders

programme.title: Barrett-Jackson: REVVED UP
programme.desc: Among a bevy of beautiful vehicles being auctioned at no reserve are Simon Cowell's 1970 Triumph Spitfire MK III Convertible and John Mayer's 2006 Ford GT Heritage Edition!

programme.title: Barrett-Jackson: REVVED UP
programme.desc: The hottest cars are rolling down the block, causing car enthusiast mayhem like never before.

programme.title: Barrett-Jackson: REVVED UP
programme.desc: Super Saturday comes out to play in Scottsdale as a global lineup of the ultimate sport cars crosses the auction block; from Porsche 911s to Ferrari 458s and America's own original sport scar, the Corvette.

programme.title: Barrett-Jackson: REVVED UP
programme.desc: Highlights from all the resto-mod rides, crazy customs and more.

programme.title: Barrett-Jackson: REVVED UP
programme.desc: The Corvette competes for best convertible, while others battle to be the top-selling Coupe, Pickup, SUV, and Roadster in this hour of the World's Greatest Collector Car Auction.

programme.title: Barrett-Jackson: REVVED UP
programme.desc: The bidding frenzy continues as Barrett-Jackson celebrates 50 years in Scottsdale, Ariz., with a cavalcade of the world's best collector cars.

programme.title: Barrett-Jackson: REVVED UP
programme.desc: The collector car hobby has exploded in recent years, with a huge range of vehicles sought after by collectors; Craig Jackson and Steve Davis discuss changes in collector car trends over time as prices climb on the auction block.

programme.desc: As the crew says goodbye for now to Houston, Texas, the World's Greatest Collector Car Auction continues to excite; someone could take home the famous Love Bug Beetle or the one-of-a-kind Ford GT.

programme.desc: As the Barrett-Jackson Scottsdale Auction comes to an end, cars from throughout history cross the auction block; bidders go head to head for cars from the 1940s to the 2010s.

programme.desc: The auction celebrates its 50th anniversary in its spiritual home of Scottsdale, Ariz., with a spectacular collector car docket.

programme.desc: Collector cars roll down the block at this year's Barrett-Jackson Palm Beach auction; Barrett-Jackson lands in Palm Beach, Fla.

programme.desc: This 50th anniversary celebration brings out some of the best and brightest cars, with some reaching over $1 million.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Shelby's client needs good quality logs to build high-end furniture that will raise money for a local charity; to find the right logs they must go deeper and deeper into the gator-infested wilderness.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: The race for logs gets hot as Papac go into their most daunting site yet; at Rygaard, the crew tries to string a road over a steep draw using a device called a knife.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: A devastating injury at Rygaard rattles the crew and threatens to stop production; Shelby's jet boat is back and it's time to go hunting; Triack is under pressure to finish their site before their permit expires.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: After last weeks accident, Gabe Rygaard makes a call to save production and gets his crew back; the Papac crew is taking a thrashing on their last site; the Zitterkopf crew fights to finish their site before the cold weather rolls in.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Shelby realizes he may be short on wood for his log buyer, so he sends his troops out to hunt for some last minute logs; Zitterkopf and Sons lose their skidder a mechanical breakdown.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: In Alaska, the team gains a boost of energy as they get two valuable hands on the landing to up production; Gabe Rygaard has his old crew back in full force, but suffer another mechanical breakdown.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Papac is finishing up the roughest most dangerous section of their site; Rygaard logging has fought hard to stay in the race, but a faulty carriage could derail their hopes; Dreadknots resurrected Logzilla to double production.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: After coming across a rare historical artifact, Shelby forms an unlikely alliance with Professor Sam Hyde of Southeastern Louisiana University and the two scour the deepest parts of the Swamp on the search for lost treasures.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Gabe Rygaard takes on the toughest challenge of his career; Papac Alaska goes to a remote, mountainous island to tackle the biggest job in the company's history; Greg Chapman starts on a quest to find a lost logging train.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Rygaard crew batles Mother Nature as temperatures climb; Joe is still reeling from his injury; Greg Chapman pulls an extremely rare double barrel log from the St John's River.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Gabe has to call upon his son Aidan to step up and fill the family shoes; an overcrowded landing means one wrong move could wipe out the Papac crew below; Greg's quest to find the Lost Log Train is back on track.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: In Washington, production's rising with the newest generation of Rygaard on the job; David Zitterkopf is back in action with his son Levi to take on their biggest; Papac's new unit puts the crew to the ultimate test.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: The Rygaard crew gets a surprise visit from logging legend Craig Rygaard; the Zitterkopfs face a major obstacle in their push to complete their largest ever job; Papac battles the Longest Yard unit with its mile long skyline.

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Rygaard Logging is trying to get back on track with the help of patriarch Craig Rygaard; the Swampman's under the gun to build an emergency treetop storm shelter; David Zitterkopf's son Levi gets a crucial lesson in logging.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When the guys spend the weekend at a hunting cabin to celebrate Martin's bachelor party, things turns explosive after they find a cache of antique black powder weapons. Meanwhile, Willie helps Kay fulfill her lifelong dream of owning a petting zoo.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Jase enters an outhouse race to help promote Willie's Duck Diner, but when the Robertsons show up for the race, they face an unexpected rival -- Phillip McMillan. Meanwhile, Willie attempts to create the world's greatest bologna sandwich for his Duck Diner menu, and enlists the help of the ladies to be his "taste testers."

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Willie helps Sadie with her homework by enlisting the guys to create a real-life version of a math problem, but when Jase and Willie get sidetracked helping Sadie.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Jep asks Willie and the guys to help move his old chicken coop into his new house, which is under renovation, Jessica takes issue with its appearance, leading the guys to yet another project.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Willie becomes an assistant coach on Lil' Will's struggling football team, his authority is tested when the kids challenge the adults to a scrimmage. Meanwhile, Kay brings Jep and Si to an aquarobics class at a local health club.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Jase and the guys transform an old pontoon boat into a floating duck blind, they are faced with the impending question of whether or not it will actually float. Meanwhile, when Kay's dog Bobo misbehaves, Willie signs Kay and Bobo up for a doggie obedience class.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Jep and Jessica move into Willie and Jase's neighborhood, Jep is sidelined with an illness, causing Willie and the Robertson family to pitch in and help Jessica get her new house ready in time for Jep's arrival home.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Willie and the guys take John Luke golfing prior to his engagement party, their attempts at marital advice don't exactly work out as planned.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Jase receives a palate of fireworks as a gift, he and the guys create a homemade fireworks display for the Robertson family 4th of July barbeque. Meanwhile, Uncle Si is honored by the veterans association and given his own exhibit at a local military museum.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Phil and Jase get into an argument about which type of duck decoy works best, Jase and the guys repaint some old decoys, betting that Phil cannot tell the difference. Meanwhile, Jessica challenges Willie to a bowling contest with Kay's "Big Sista's" club.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Jase and the guys discover they have a knack for removing pests from other people's property, they use their new talents to their advantage. Meanwhile, Willie gives Sadie and John Luke summer jobs at his diner, but first he must train them to be good employees.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When an office prank war spirals out of control, Phil volunteers Willie, Jase, and Jep to help Alan at the church, which seems more like a punishment than charity work. Meanwhile, Korie gives Kay a surprise art class taught by famous artist Pierre Matisse.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: In this very special wedding episode, John Luke Robertson is getting married to his fiancé Mary Kate, and our cameras are with him every step of the way.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: When Missy's parents visit, her father convinces Jase to take him on a quail hunt. But while their "bonding hunt" yields very few quail, it does bring them closer together as friends.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Si recruits his nephews to help him transport a storage container to his backyard, but things take a turn when Jep becomes locked inside the box.
